settings.display_tag_sticky_label: Show tag stickies in the "All Discussions" list
settings.display_tag_sticky_text: They will be treated as regular discussions and won't stick to the top.

stickiest_modal.title: Sticky {title}
stickiest_modal.sticky_text: Sticky discussions will stick to the top in the "All Discussions" list if they are unread. When viewing a specific tag which belongs to the discussion, they will stick to the top at all times.
stickiest_modal.super_sticky_text: Super sticky discussions will stick to the uppermost no matter what.
stickiest_modal.tag_sticky_text: Tag stickies are hidden in the "All Discussions" list by default. They will only be shown and stick to the top when viewing a specific tag, that is one of the tags those you will choose here. This option can be combined with "Super Sticky".

post_stream.discussion_super_stickied_text: {username} marked the discussion as super sticky.
post_stream.discussion_common_stickied_text: {username} unmarked the discussion as super sticky.
